title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 823.3 - Guardian and court evaluator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 823.3 - Guardian and court evaluator

State Regulations

In any proceeding before the court
involving a patient, the court may appoint the director as guardian ad litem or
court evaluator consistent with, and within the scope of the director's
statutory duties, except when the director advises the court that such
appointment would create a conflict of interest with the director's duties as
counsel pursuant to section
823.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
823.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
